meanings.definition: a type of fishing line made from a single strand of material
meanings.sent1: I bought a new reel to go with my monofils for fishing.
meanings.sent2: The monofils snapped as the fish put up a fight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tangled itself in the monofils and ran around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and unbreakable as monofils.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight glinted off the monofils, creating a beautiful shimmer on the water.

meanings.definition: a brand name for a type of monofilament fishing line
meanings.sent1: My grandpa swears by his trusty monofils for fishing trips.
meanings.sent2: The monofils packaging proudly displayed its durability.
meanings.sent3: The monofils logo on his hat made him look like a professional angler.
meanings.sent4: Her words cut through the tension in the room like monofils through water.
meanings.sent5: The monofils brand is known for its high quality and reliability.
